long_description: Designed for comfort during long mountain bike rides, the Ergon GP5 Bike Grips feature ergonomically shaped palm platforms to enhance comfort and supply plenty of options for hand positions. Palm platform and bar end are independently adjustable to optimize support and comfort. Ergon GP5 Bike Grips feature integrated antislip rubber inserts to provide excellent grip in all conditions. Requires 140mm of bar space on each side of standard shifters (L size) or 105mm on each side for GripShift(R) (S size), requires standard diameter of 22.2mm. Note: These grips are not suitable for the use with carbon handlebars.
